nodes.text: The Mandalorian secret service was a security organization of the New Mandalorian government. It was an elite unit of the Mandalorian Guard but had several corrupt members who were in league with Prime Minister Almec in establishing an illegal black market on Mandalore. Their plot was uncovered by Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano and a team of cadets from the New Mandalorian Royal Academy of Government.
